Farhan, Moh. F

I am a motivated industrial engineer with experience in digital product management/product owner and business process improvement. This experience has shaped a more mature mindset in developing good product that meet user needs to adapt to a fast-paced industry. I have a high interest in Product management, Product Growth, Lean, Productivity Improvement, and Project Management. I am adaptable in any condition, discipline, optimistic, eager to learn new things, and believe that every human has the potential and advantages to make a good impact.
